yellow.answer: Mold, Dust mites, Cockroaches, Pollen, Animal dander, Feathers

yellow.answer: Pollution, fumes, outdoor smoke (Fires), viral infections, weather changes

yellow.question: Is there a true breed of a hypoallergenic dog? Why?
yellow.answer: No, because if someone is allergic the allergen is carried in hair, dander, saliva, urine, and they carry allergens on them such as dust, pollens

yellow.question: If cold air is an asthma trigger what precaution can be taken to minimize the effect on the airways?
yellow.answer: Breathe through nose to warm the air, cover face with scarf, mask when outdoors, limit time in cold air, take prescribed medications

yellow.question: If exercise is an asthma trigger what precautions can be taken to minimize the effect on the airways?
yellow.answer: Take prescribed medications as directed, inform provider if having EIA symptoms you may need to premedicate with a bronchodilator or change your controller medication to lessen the EIA symptoms, do warm ups & cool downs
